name: Octillery VS Putin
description:
Right after Octillery VS Xi Jinping, Octillery finds out about the war breaking out in Ukraine.

He decides to go fuck up Putin.

A short RPG made in RPG Maker 2003 with web support by The EasyRPG Team.

See familiar faces once again, such as Octillery, John Xina, The Wock, and Marill The Hedgehog.

Play on Newgrounds
